f_coupon.sys.core.dao.db

Class CompanyDaoDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • f_coupon.sys.core.dao.db.CompanyDaoDB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompanyDAO

    public class CompanyDaoDB
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompanyDAO

    CompanyDAODB implements the Company C.R.U.D (Create,Read,Update,Delete) actions in the DB using JDBC connection and SQL query.

    Purpose:The Application layer would eventually Creates Java Beans (Company, Coupon etc.)

    and would sent those to the DAO that will implement at DAODB and convert to SQL commands using JDBC.

    Since:
    2018-09-06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Assaf Ben David

        public void createCompanyCouponMap(long company_id,
                                   long coupon_id)
                            throws couponSystemException
        createCompanyCouponMap method used to add index reference to the map index table called "company_coupon". There can be a few coupons for the same company but not the same coupon to the same Company.
        Parameters:
        company_id - The Company id (index)
        coupon_id - The Coupon id (index)
